settings.title: Not Sure Which to Choose? Here Are Our Expert Picks:

settings.html:
Your Source for High-Quality LED High Bay Lights

When it comes to lighting large industrial or commercial spaces, you need the best high bay lights on the market—at a price that fits your budget—and ELEDLights' high bay fixtures are here to deliver: Get the best price and the highest quality, no sacrifices needed.

The Brightest High Bay LED Lights

Our LED high bay lights are designed for maximum light output, offering unparalleled brightness. We understand that in many settings, bright, clear light is not just about visibility but also safety. That's why we ensure our high bay lights are among the brightest high bay LED lights on the market. The brighter the output, the lower the wattage you need to install, and the lower the wattage, the bigger the energy savings.

Whether you need LED warehouse lights, LED high bay shop lights, or high bay lights for any other application, ELEDLights has the best light for you. If you don't see the LED high bay light that suits your needs on our web store, don't hesitate to contact us. We have access to the catalogs of most major lighting manufacturers and can source whatever you may need.

Unmatched Efficiency for High-Ceiling Environments

When it comes to illuminating spaces with ceilings reaching 20 feet or more, our high bay LED lights offer the perfect solution. Designed for brightness, uniform illumination, and significantly reduce energy consumption & maintenance costs, our LED high bay lights are the ideal choice for many industrial and commercial settings.

LED High Bay Lighting Price Guarantee

At ELEDLights, we're committed to offering our LED high bay lights at competitive prices. We work hard to keep our high bay LED lights affordable while never compromising on product quality—or on the quality of support we offer.

That's why we offer bulk buying discounts. We also help customers take advantage of energy efficiency rebates and financial incentives, lowering costs even more. You can preview available instant rebate savings on any LED high bay lights' page: Just click Find Instant Rebates and enter your zip code. If no instant rebates are available, get in touch with our team—there may be other cost-savings options we can find for you.

With ELEDLights, you can illuminate your space, no matter how large or small, without breaking your budget.

LED High Bay Lights for Sale to Cover a Whole Range of Applications

Our collection of LED high bay lights includes models suitable for just about every need. Whether you're lighting a small warehouse or massive logistics center, a gymnasium or event center, a factory, a hangar, a retail store, or any other large space, we have an LED high bay light solution for you (including food-safe, explosion-proof, and hazardous-location options).

And every model we offer is designed for easy installation, energy efficiency, and long-term durability.

Take advantage of our LED high bay lights for sale today and transform your space with efficient, bright, and reliable lighting.

Two Distinct Types of High Bay LED Lights

Discover the versatility of high bay LED lights, categorized into two main types: Round and linear fixtures. Both options deliver bright and even illumination, enhancing visibility and safety in commercial and industrial environments. Distinctions between the two types include:

Linear High Bay LED Lighting

Linear high bay LED lighting, with its sleek rectangular shape, is the traditional choice for warehouses, gymnasiums, and factories – especially spaces with aisles and shelving to illuminate. Ideal for replacing old fluorescent fixtures with a cost-effective LED alternative, these lights are easy to install; they are often suspended by chains or wire but can also be mounted directly to the ceiling.

Round High Bay LED Light Fixtures

Contractors favor our round high bay LED light fixtures for new construction projects, offering unmatched efficiency and maintenance-free performance. Designed for superior thermal heat dissipation, these fixtures boast a modern shape and modern efficiency. They are sure to elevate the aesthetics of a wide range of spaces, from large industrial spaces to niche locations like restaurants with high ceilings and an industrial style.

Why LEDs are the Stand-Out Choice for High Bay Fixtures

LED technology is the best commercial high bay solution. The advantages of LED high bay fixtures include:

  • Higher Efficiency: Consuming far less energy than traditional lights, LED high bay lights lead to lower energy bills and a reduced carbon footprint.
  • Longer Lasting: With a lifespan of up to 50,000 hours or more, LED lights save on maintenance costs.
  • Improved Brightness: Achieve higher levels of brightness with fewer fixtures, reducing overall lighting expenses.
  • Better Color Rendering: Enhance visibility in manufacturing, warehousing, and retail with vivid and accurate colors.
  • Increased Safety: LED lights produce less heat, reducing the risk of fires, and are free from harmful chemicals like mercury.
  • Very Sustainable: Designed for easy recycling and reduced waste, LED lights contribute to environmental sustainability by using less energy and producing fewer greenhouse gas emissions.

Take advantage of our ready-to-ship LED high bay lights today and complete your project with efficient, bright, and reliable lighting

settings.title: What's the Difference Between LED High Bay Fixtures and Low Bay Lighting?
settings.answer:
The main answer is ceiling height. As a rule, high bay lights are typically chosen for ceilings over 15 feet while low bay lights are for between 9 and 15 feet (on average).

The other factor is beam angle. High bays are higher wattage, in order to ensure more light reaches the work area. The higher they’re installed, the narrower the beam angle you’ll want to choose in order to compensate for the vertical distance between fixture and work area. Low bay lights, conversely, have a wider beam angle that spreads the light out more within a shorter vertical distance (between fixture and work area).If you have questions about what wattage, style, or beam angle to get for your application, ask our lighting experts! We are experts at assisting customers with high bay and low bay LED lighting applications.

settings.title: Where Are High Bay and Low Bay Fixtures Used?
settings.answer: High and low bay fixtures are designed for locations with ceilings that are higher than “standard” (8 feet). For low bay lights, this includes machine and auto shops, garages, small warehouses and manufacturing areas, small hangars, retail stores, fitness centers, and more. For high bays, it means medium to large warehouses, factories, processing plants, large hangars, gymnasiums, arenas, and more.

settings.title: How Many High Bay Light Fixtures Do I Need?
settings.answer: The number of high bay lights needed for a given application is dependent on the size of the space being lit, the height of the ceilings, and other factors (such as additional light sources, wattage requirements, etc). To get an accurate estimate, you can receive a custom lighting layout at no extra cost by submitting a simple lighting services request.

settings.title: Can High Bay LED Lights Be Dimmed?
settings.answer: Yes, most of our LED lighting products come equipped with 0-10V dimming capability. Some models also offer smart control options, which include dimming, timing, and daylight harvesting abilities.
